overview: Shot in Rome, "History Lessons by Comparison" retraces and compares fine details in one of the driving scenes from Jean-Marie Straub and Dani√®le Huillet's 1972 film, "Geschichtsunterricht". Because Luisa Greenfield had lived in the neighborhood where this driving scene was shot, personal history and the lessons of film history intersect and cross over.
title: History Lessons by Comparison
